contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox city Japan |Name= Nakagawa |JapaneseName= 中川村 |settlement_type= Village |MapImage= Nakagawa in Nagano Prefecture Ja.svg |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]] |District= [[Kamiina District, Nagano|Kamiina]] |ImageSkyline= |ImageCaption= |Area_km2= 77.05 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 5,412 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 35 |LatitudeMinutes= 38 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 137 |LongtitudeMinutes= 57 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www2.vill.nakagawa.nagano.jp/ Village of Nakagawa] }} {{Nihongo|'''Nakagawa'''|中川村|Nakagawa-mura}} is a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Kamiina District, Nagano|Kamiina District]], [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the village has an estimated [[population]] of 5,412 and a [[population density|density]] of 70.24 people per km². The total area is 77.05 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www2.vill.nakagawa.nagano.jp/ Nakagawa official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Villages in Nagano Prefecture]] {{Nagano-geo-stub}}
